medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse mid-abdominal pain that later localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain woke the patient out of bed around 3:30 am, later localized to RLQ several hours later. The patient also reported nausea/anorexia but no emesis. There was a 1-week history of intermittent constipation, but the patient continues to pass flatus. Denies fevers/chills, dysuria, recent weight loss, chest pain, or shortness of breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of severe meningitis/sepsis complicated by renal failure requiring hemodialysis (now resolved with a baseline creatinine of ~1.5), HIT positive, obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) on home CPAP, hypertension (HTN).
